title: Memory-Safe C: TrapC's Pitch to the C ISO Working Group
author: David Cassel
description: TrapC extension promises to enable recompiling legacy C code into executables that are safe by design and secure by default with minimal code refactoring.
cntitle: 内存安全 C：TrapC 向 C ISO 工作组的提案
cndescription: TrapC 扩展承诺通过最少的代码重构，使遗留 C 代码能够重新编译为本质安全且默认安全的的可执行文件。
